entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as bursting into the room with cold fury in her voice.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as closely following Professor McGonagall and giving Harry a swift, piercing look.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is described as bringing up the rear and taking one look at the troll before sitting down on a toilet.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as standing with his wand in the air and looking at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking at Ron and Professor McGonagall, and having hopes of winning fifty points for Gryffindor fade from his mind.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as getting to her feet at last and speaking in a small voice.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that Harry hopes to win points for.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall scolds Ron for his actions.
Snape gives Harry a swift, piercing look.
Quirrell is afraid of the troll and sits down on a toilet.
